title: Apply for the Program of Comprehensive Assistance for Family Caregivers

introductionPage.mainTitle: Apply for the Program of Comprehensive Assistance for Family Caregivers
introductionPage.equalToForm: Equal to VA Form 10-10CG (Application for Family Caregiver Benefits)
introductionPage.introText: We recognize the important role of family caregivers in supporting the health and wellness of Veterans.
introductionPage.stepsHeading: Follow these steps to get started:

step1.toFillOutThisApplication: To fill out this application, you’ll need your:
step1.whatIfINeedHelp: What if I need help filling out my application?
step1.anAccreditedRepresentative: An accredited representative, like a Veterans Service Officer (VSO), can help you fill out your claim.

page1.vetSSN: Veteran’s Social Security number or tax identification number
page1.vetSSNWhyExp: We need the Veteran’s Social Security number or tax identification number to process the application when it’s submitted online, but it’s not a requirement to apply for the program.
page1.vetSSNRequired: Please enter a Social Security or tax identification number
page1.vetSSNInvalid: Please enter a valid Social Security or tax identification number
